## PatternRule interface

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Pattern-based rule definition.

A pattern rule uses a template with placeholders that get substituted with concrete values during evaluation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface PatternRule 
```

## Example


```typescript
const rule: PatternRule = {
  type: 'pattern',
  template: 'removed {target}',
  variables: [{ name: 'target', value: 'export', type: 'target' }],
  returns: 'major',
  description: 'Export removal rule'
}
```
